name: Mr. Dinos
description:
It's a game that has two dinosaurs. As you know that dinosaurs are not available today. In a way it is not REAL! This game is a bit old fashioned as it is black and white. This game contents many levels which you have to solve.

Controls - 

WASD for Dino1

Arrow Keys for Dino2

Tools Used -

Unity 2020.3.11f.1

Adobe Photoshop CC

Visual Studio 2019

Bosca Ceoil
